page.title: 14MILVERTON PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: The primary school is in a fairly central postion.Outside the school runs the main road to Wellington. The school has a hall which is used for assembly,dining and P.E. in bad weather.The kitchen is joined to the hall.There is a main building which has 3 large classrooms,the office staffroom,study,and a small library. There is a playing field and two playgrounds.There are 5 classrooms altogether,two of them are seperate from the main building.There are 6 teachers including the Headmaster. There is one teacher to one class, teaching all the different subjects. The junior girls play sports such as netball and shinty,the junior boys play cricket and football.The school has a choir and gym club.
